title: Teacher Support with Dr. Jody Carrington
description:
Joe is joined once again by the amazing Dr. Jody Carrington. They chat about how to deal with the hardest kids, what supporting teachers looks like, and the meet-cute story of how Jody and Joe became friends, before getting into an email about intense Catfishing.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
